from yhat import BaseModel
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd

from yhat.deployment.input_and_output import preprocess
from yhat.deployment.models import YhatModel
import json
import pickle
import terragon


# code for <class '__main__.HelloWorld'>
class HelloWorld(YhatModel):
    @preprocess(in_type=dict, out_type=dict)
    def execute(self, data):
        me = data['name']
        greeting = "Hello %s!" % me
        return { "greeting": greeting }
